1b1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum bu gsum pa/
1b2: bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de
1b3: 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
1b4: tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
1b5: bstan to/ / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs zhe
1b6: zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
1b7: tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan/
1b8: gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba

2a1: men ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thos bstan to/ / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshe rab mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
2a2: bstan te/ / tshir rab sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dpags pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis che de bstan to// tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
2a3: pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / tsherU ba stong zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tsher rab mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos bstan to// tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de
2a4: me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes
2a5: me rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan te/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
2a6: bstan to/ / 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
2a7: chos bstan to/ / 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmig/ pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes dben zhes bya bar
2a8: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed

2b1: bdag med ces bya ba dadapa bamigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan te/ / 'du byed 'i zhes bya bar de sa dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 'astan to// 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs nyi'i rdul gyis chos bstar to// byed
2b2: mtshan pa med ces bya bar dam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / 'angadu byed dpon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mngon para'ang byeb meng ces bya bar de pi dmigs pa'i tshul
2b3: gyis ngas bsan to/ / 'du byed dben zhes bya bar dem dmapa'i tshul gyis chos bstan po// rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bsdur te/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes
2b4: ba de me dgas pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan te/ / na pa bdag med ces bya bar de me migs pa'i tshul gyis ros bstan to// rnam par shes pa'i zhes bya bar de rkang legs par rdul gyis rjes bskur ro//
2b5: nga shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bstan to// rnam par shes pa tsun ma med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// mapar shes pa ston pa med ces bya bar nga ma
2b6: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches bstan to/ / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches bstar te/ rnam par shes pa dber zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan
2b7: ternapa mo/ / rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byan pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rer ba dam 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro//
2b8: ba 'bor ga'ang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ gzugs grang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid

3a1: byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bza dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
3a2: gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs
3a3: rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang na ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang stong pa'i rnam
3a4: par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
3a5: byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba
3a6: dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mngon pa 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang dben pa'i
3a7: rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang / mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
3a8: la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshong ba gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya

3b1: ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang zhi ba'i rnam
3b2: par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan
3b3: thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/
3b4: tshor ba gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la
3b5: byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang /
3b6: rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes
3b7: gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed par mi
3b8: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang

4a1: sa sargyas kyi 'das thab ma ldan sa/ 'dugs gas pa rnam par med byed pa dam dgas pa rgyas gyis me sa byed do// nyan pa pa dang / ra sa sa kyis da bya ba dang maldan papa/
4a2: gang badzad ma med pa'i rnam par yang la byed pa de me pags pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// na thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yi sa bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'dra shes gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par ming la byed pa des
4a3: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yod la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
4a4: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi
4a5: ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid
4a6: la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
4a7: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas
4a8: 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi

4b1: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
4b2: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
4b3: la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mi
4b4: rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa
4b5: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
4b6: byed do/ / na thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang shi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
4b7: kyi ming la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i rnas par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yings bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes
4b8: gang ma na ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang rngon pa med pa'i dam par yid la rkyed

5a1: na mams 'das ca pa/ nas dang / mdasas pa da maldan sa/ rnam pa shes pa ga da nas pa yo ca pa dang
5a2: sa gyis yid la byed do/ / na thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed de// rab 'byor 'din pa
5a3: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs me dang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
5a4: gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ chas de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / na
5a5: ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang mos pa 'di
5a6: ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
5a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//
5a8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs bdag med

5b1: ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
5b2: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
5b3: ba'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
5b4: pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de me dmigs pa'i/
5b5: tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
5b6: tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//
5b7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar
5b8: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

6a1: nyi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sngon pa med ces bya bar de med pags pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas/ tshang ba mngon par dra bya
6a2: med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams
6a3: pad mkhyen pa da dang ldan pa med la byabs/ 'dugs ma tag ces bya bar dmed pags tshul gyis pa rtog go// rnas pathams cad ma khyen pa ny-id nga ldan pa'i yid byubs/ nu drug
6a4: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad
6a5: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
6a6: pa'i chus gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
6a7: med sa byabs/ 'dra gas smon pa med ces bya bar dmi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis da sa rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la rnabs/ 'jugs mngon par cu bya ba med ces bya ba dam
6a8: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan

6b1: pa'i yin la bas/ 'ang byed mi// gces bya bar de sa mags pa rgyas kyis rab tu rtag go/ rnam pa thams cad mardzun pa ny-id dang ldan pa'i yod la zlabs/ la byed drug bsngal nas ba da ma migs pa//
6b2: tshul gyis rab sa tog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
6b3: bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa
6b4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa
6b5: med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
6b6: rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam
6b7: par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
6b8: gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

7a1: dang ldan pa' yad la byabs/ rnam par shes pa nanas bya bar dem dpags pa 'drul byas rab tu rtag pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yad la byabs/ rnam pa gas pa song nas/
7a2: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//
7a3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la/
7a4: bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya
7a5: bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / de ltar de de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
7a6: sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ / de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
7a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
7a8: rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'

7b1: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan
7b2: thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
7b3: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
7b4: la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
7b5: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan
7b6: gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i/
7b7: tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
7b8: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid

8a1: la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
8a2: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
8a3: bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
8a4: mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed kyi
8a5: dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog
8a6: cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
8a7: byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ / nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ngas
8a8: mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan byigo mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa

8b1: yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba
8b2: gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya
8b3: bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
8b4: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
8b5: rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa
8b6: thams cad mkhyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
8b7: su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med
8b8: ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems

9a1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
9a2: rtog cing / / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gnani gya go ma 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
9a3: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
9a4: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
9a5: nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/
9a6: dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa
9a7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma
9a8: yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

9b1: ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma
9b2: yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
9b3: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang
9b4: chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
9b5: pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur
9b6: ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes
9b7: stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed/
9b8: pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / dmarnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la bya bas/ 'dugs pa na mdzo/

10a1: ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'ang
10a2: pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de ma
10a3: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi byed pa dang // byang
10a4: rab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar
10a5: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang / byang chub
10a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i/
10a7: tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'
10a8: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtog ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /

10b1: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / me dge ba dem yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi gam 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kya
10b2: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
10b3: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi gom 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
10b4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed pa dag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba
10b5: de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
10b6: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
10b7: su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du
10b8: byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed pa

11a1: ngang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de sa
11a2: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems
11a3: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos
11a4: dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin/ pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
11a5: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang
11a6: sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
11a7: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
11a8: yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam

11b1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyang dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ rnam pa gas pa ma rtag ces bya bar dam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge
11b2: dem yin pa byang chub kyi bgags su 'byur ba gzhan gyi gong 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
11b3: pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
11b4: bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
11b5: rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan
11b6: kyi go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya
11b7: ber de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub
11b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

12a1: kyis rtag cang / nyan zas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go po 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sams
12a2: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
12a3: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
12a4: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang
12a5: sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
12a6: la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
12a7: rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
12a8: nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /

12b1: mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi gom 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems
12b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
12b3: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong ba ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kya
12b4: stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du shes stong pa pa yin
12b5: gyi/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
12b6: gyis/ dam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ ram par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis/ mig stong ba pa yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
12b7: kyang mig go/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang snga'o//
12b8: lce'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyi stong pa

13a1: ta byas/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid go// stong pa nyid kyang yod // gzugs bya snang pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid de//
13a2: kyang gzugs so// sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyar pa'o// tshe'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dri stong / ma yin gyi/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ga/ 8
13a3: stong pa nyid kyis/ rasnang pa ma yin gyi/ de nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyar ngo'o// reg gi zung pa nyid kyis/ ragasor pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg ga/ chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis/
13a4: chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang steng
13a5: pa nyid de/ / stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// snang pa nyid kyang
13a6: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ snga'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o//
13a7: lce rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ kwa'i rnam par shes pa sang pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa
13a8: stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid

13b1: gyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus
13b2: te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin
13b3: gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa
13b4: nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa song pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// snang pa
13b5: kyang m+b+hi 'dus ga ga/ / lus kyi 'dus te ga pa'i slong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi lus dag pa zod pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te dag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid pa// gang pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te ga /
13b6: pa sh+na glu ga las ga r+dz+dza ste/ shA sa
13b7: xxx/ xxx
13b8: xxx/ xxx

14a1: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
14a2: ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/
14a3: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te
14a4: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi
14a5: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
14a6: ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
14a7: stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// ru'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// de'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ me'i
14a8: khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// /

14b1: stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// ram mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i
14b2: khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/
14b3: ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// btu byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du byed stong pa ma yid gyi/ 'du byed/ nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dra/
14b4: byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyim/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ring dang gzugs
14b5: stong pa ma yin gyi/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug gi stong pa rid kyis/ bye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
14b6: stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tsher
14b7: pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ len pa
14b8: stong pa ma yin gyi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba'i stong pa nyid

15a1: kyis skye ba stong pa ma yin gyiskye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rga shi stong pa ma yin gyi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
15a2: rga shi'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sbyid pa'i pha rol du phyin pa spyod pa ma yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshul
15a3: thams kyi bar 'du byin pa'i rkang pa nyid kyis/ tshul thams kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khems kyi par ma du phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshul thabs kyi pa yang
15a4: byin pa'o/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rom du phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bzod pa'i phararol du phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol du byed
15a5: pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ brtsod 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang brtsod 'grus
15a6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
15a7: bsapa gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
15a8: pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong

15b1: pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa pa yin gyi/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi stod pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa da kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa
15b2: gyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi dang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid
15b3: do/ / stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do//
15b4: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
15b5: kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/
15b6: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ mtha' ya
15b7: 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/
15b8: thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid // dor ba med pa stong pa

16a1: bcang kyis/ rang ba da pa spong bcing snang bam yin gyi/ ded ba med pa sang pa nyid kyang stong bcad do// sang pa nyid kyang dong ba med pa stong ba nyid do// rang bzhin stong band kyi stong pa nyid
16a2: kyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos
16a3: thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang gi
16a4: mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ mi da mtha
16a5: pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po med pa
16a6: stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
16a7: spong ba ma yin gyi/ rab nyid stong pa nyid kyang song bad da/ snang pa nyid kyang ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid do// dngas po meng pa'i nga bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dang / bamed pa'i nga ba tad sang ba nyid
16a8: stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa

16b1: bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ngan pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyi/ yang dag par
16b2: ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
16b3: stong pa ma yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po'i stong pa nyid kyis dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong
16b4: pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so/ byang chub kyi yan ragagi stong nyid kyis byang du
16b5: kye yan lag stong pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phag ma pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i
16b6: lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa
16b7: nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam
16b8: gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshad med pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshad med pa nyid

17a1: kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid 'tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/
17a2: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam pa thar pa rnams
17a3: stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
17a4: par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i
17a5: sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
17a6: dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/
17a7: mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ting nge 'dzin
17a8: rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid

17b1: kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa
17b2: stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa
17b3: nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/
17b4: stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis/ snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o//
17b5: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs
17b6: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
17b7: po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi
17b8: dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyer gyis

18a1: yongs su zin pa'i byang rabasapas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'idi thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes ga/
18a2: de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmig pa'i tshul gyis
18a3: chos ston cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mi rtag ces
18a4: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
18a5: pa'o/ / gang de la 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
18a6: sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma/
18a7: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
18a8: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

18b1: dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dag pa'i gshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
18b2: gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor
18b3: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
18b4: su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
18b5: thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
18b6: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
18b7: kyi chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
18b8: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /

19a1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngod mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
19a2: pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
19a3: la 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
19a4: rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stong cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
19a5: nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
19a6: ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
19a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
19a8: mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba

19b1: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad maldan pa nyid ma gtogs ma nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
19b2: tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
19b3: 'du byed ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
19b4: kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
19b5: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ne/ gang
19b6: de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
19b7: sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tsher bstong zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
19b8: kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

20a1: panyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sang yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed steng zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul byas chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa
20a2: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
20a3: gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
20a4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
20a5: cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
20a6: cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces
20a7: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
20a8: pa'o/ / gang de la 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang

20b1: sangs rgyas kyi sar yangs su bsngod mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma mar u0f7fsa bya bar ma dmigs par rdul byams snyan cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
20b2: nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por dge ba bshes garted ni/ gang de la gzug+sa
20b3: smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sangs/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang
20b4: sra bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de 'tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul rje sacom ldan cing dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'ad ma gtogs par nyan thos
20b5: kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dra shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad/
20b6: mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bstir mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed khron pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge pa'i
20b7: rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar
20b8: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bskor mi 'jug

21a1: pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
21a2: ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya
21a3: ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
21a4: su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
21a5: dogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su bsngod mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
21a6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
21a7: tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
21a8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad

21b1: mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
21b2: thams carnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtags par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngod mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes dben na
21b3: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
21b4: pa'o/ / gang de la 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
21b5: rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
21b6: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//
21b7: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul bye chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
21b8: rab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

22a1: ma na / da ma pa yas dam na tad gags pa nyanaHsas / rangs sas kyis ma lda 'dug pa/
22a2: me tag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
22a3: su bsdod ma 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce me rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
22a4: thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
22a5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
22a6: cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
22a7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
22a8: mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing

22b1: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar dam
22b2: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
22b3: gang de la lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
22b4: kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
22b5: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
22b6: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
22b7: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
22b8: sras kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnab bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cingag / dag pa'i rtsa ba thangams cad kyang / rnam pa thams

23a1: cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
23a2: stod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce bdag med ces bya bar de mi
23a3: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stor cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
23a4: la lus bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
23a5: su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid bdag med ces bya bar de me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis/
23a6: 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mi gzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
23a7: pa'i tshul gyis chos stod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna pa
23a8: zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'gru

23b1: pa'o/ / gang de la sna zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
23b2: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lte zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
23b3: 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
23b4: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
23b5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
23b6: bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang /
23b7: sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
23b8: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

24a1: kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
24a2: tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
24a3: lus stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
24a4: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
24a5: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mtshan
24a6: ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
24a7: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
24a8: par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang

24b1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
24b2: ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mtshan ma
24b3: med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
24b4: bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
24b5: thos kyi sa 'ang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig smon pa med ces
24b6: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
24b7: 'jug pa'o/ / gang de rna ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
24b8: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad

25a1: mkhyen pa nyid pa gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stod cing
25a2: ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus smon pa med ces bya bar
25a3: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
25a4: 'o/ / gang de la yid smon pa med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/
