49b5: 'am/ rangasangs rgyas kyis yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol du smin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stor cing dge rtsab thams cad
49b6: nga / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de
49b7: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor
49b8: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /

50a1: ma
50a2: xxx/ xxx
50a3: bzod pa'i la ma du smin par bar zhes bya bar dem dmigs pa'i tshus gyis tsam ldan cing dag pa'i rtsa bathams pa dbyu/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par ca kyi kyis 'di
50a4: sa yongs su 'gyur ma 'jug par/ / gang des btsun 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben nas bya bar dmi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ci dge ba'i tha thams cadakyang / rnam pa thams cad mabyed pa ny-i pa ga dz+ra
50a5: par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
50a6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
50a7: chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
50a8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam

50b1: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyag dza
50b2: pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de ba dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
50b3: de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ce
50b4: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o
50b5: gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
50b6: sar yongs su bsngor mi 'dzag pa'o/ / gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
50b7: pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
50b8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces ga bar de mi dmigs pa'i

51a1: tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
51a2: gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
51a3: sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
51a4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
51a5: gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa
51a6: nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
51a7: su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gto gra
51a8: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams

51b1: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
51b2: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
51b3: pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
51b4: kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngod mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
51b5: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de
51b6: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
51b7: 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
51b8: na cing dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid

52a1: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dag pa rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rangs ma
52a2: rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
52a3: pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
52a4: cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid sdug
52a5: bsngal zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cang dge ba rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
52a6: su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
52a7: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
52a8: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa

52b1: nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
52b2: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
52b3: mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
52b4: tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la/
52b5: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
52b6: kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'dzag pa'o/ / gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ngo ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
52b7: nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
52b8: pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes/

53a1: bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
53a2: bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
53a3: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
53a4: ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
53a5: zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor ma
53a6: 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog/
53a7: par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag
53a8: med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor

53b1: mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang dam bya snang pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar dam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos snyan cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan gyis kyis
53b2: 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
53b3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
53b4: byes chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa
53b5: nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
53b6: bsngor la 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
53b7: 1byas kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsab thams cad
53b8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yangs su bsngor mi 'jug pal// gang dal 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya ba ma

54a1: dmigs pa'i tshur gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngod
54a2: mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
54a3: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
54a4: ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
54a5: bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
54a6: su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
54a7: par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
54a8: ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

54b1: bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
54b2: bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtong//
54b3: par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
54b4: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar
54b5: de mi dmigs pa'i rgal gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
54b6: pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
54b7: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong
54b8: pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs

55a1: su bsngor ma 'jug pa'o/ / gang del gyi stong pa nyid ga nas bya bar dam dmigs pa'i rgyal gyis chos ston cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
55a2: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
55a3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches
55a4: ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid ni
55a5: zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
55a6: 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
55a7: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
55a8: pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i

55b1: rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'i des
55b2: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor ma
55b3: 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'i 'as bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa
55b4: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
55b5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
55b6: chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad
55b7: stong pa nyid zhe zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
55b8: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid//

56a1: ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
56a2: chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med
56a3: pa stong pa nyid 'i zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar/
56a4: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
56a5: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
56a6: kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
56a7: po'i dag pa'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
56a8: thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa

56b1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
56b2: cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma ldan pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
56b3: zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'ab/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
56b4: mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
56b5: 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bgror mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
56b6: thams cad bamed pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
56b7: stor cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong
56b8: pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su

57a1: bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
57a2: ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngod mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
57a3: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong
57a4: zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
57a5: su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / ga la rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos son cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gau0f89u0fa4 p
57a6: ar nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
57a7: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes/
57a8: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sA 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor/

57b1: mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
57b2: sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
57b3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
57b4: chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po sang pa'i
57b5: 'a stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
57b6: sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i
57b7: tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi snga yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa
57b8: 'di mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngod

58a1: mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar do mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
58a2: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa
58a3: bababs cad kyang / dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces kyi
58a4: bar de yi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
58a5: pa'o/ / gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
58a6: 1rathob kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
58a7: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thob kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid paran
58a8: ma pad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyang mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi

58b1: yar yangs su bsngor ma 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
58b2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces
58b3: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
58b4: bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
58b5: nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
58b6: gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
58b7: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
58b8: kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba

59a1: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su bsngod ma 'jug pa'o// gang de lam
59a2: dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
59a3: 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
59a4: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma
59a5: med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
59a6: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
59a7: mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
59a8: ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid smon pa med bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par

59b1: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
59b2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
59b3: tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sto/
59b4: panyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
59b5: sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
59b6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar ngo ma dmigs/
59b7: pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
59b8: gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis

60a1: 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
60a2: ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa
60a3: stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
60a4: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
60a5: ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
60a6: smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
60a7: rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
60a8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de ma

60b1: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos son cid dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa
60b2: gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyang thos
60b3: sa'ang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge pa'i
60b4: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa ma
60b5: ces bya bar ngam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
60b6: bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
60b7: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa 'tshul bya
60b8: snyan cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan

61a1: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dag pa'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'dra bya ba med ces zla dang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
61a2: cing dge ba'i rtsa bathams cad kya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo ro ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid
61a3: mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
61a4: sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
61a5: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de
61a6: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngod mi 'ja
61a7: pa'o/ / gang nga la chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
61a8: par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston

61b1: cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa
61b2: nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
61b3: sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
61b4: kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par
61b5: 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
61b6: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
61b7: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar
61b8: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// /

62a1: gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
62a2: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
62a3: chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa med pa gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan/
62a4: da stong pa nyid mngon par 'du ba ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
62a5: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngom par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
62a6: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams capar zhen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon
62a7: par 'ang bya ba med ces bya ba dang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi pa'am/ rang sangs
62a8: rgyas kyi par yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams

62b1: cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dalegs
62b2: pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
62b3: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
62b4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
62b5: ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dben
62b6: zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
62b7: mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
62b8: thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

63a1: nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
63a2: ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid
63a3: dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
63a4: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
63a5: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
63a6: cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma
63a7: med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
63a8: kye sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

63b1: ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
63b2: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes
63b3: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi 'jug
63b4: pa'o/ / gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
63b5: kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
63b6: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar
63b7: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
63b8: 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos

64a1: kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i rdul gyis chos ston cing
64a2: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
64a3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
64a4: kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal
64a5: zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
64a6: bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/
64a7: nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
64a8: cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

64b1: rnamam shes bya bar dam dmigs pa 'dam byas mas pan cang dag par rtsa ba thams cadakya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa tad ma gtags par can rdzas byas 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yangs du
64b2: bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog/
64b3: par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba tham
64b4: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
64b5: ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
64b6: gang de la dran pa' bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
64b7: sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
64b8: cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

65a1: kyi mchos ston cang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang
65a2: dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
65a3: sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
65a4: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
65a5: gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag
65a6: par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
65a7: kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
65a8: cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

65b1: pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
65b2: yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan
65b3: thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
65b4: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi
65b5: dpags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
65b6: 'jug pa'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po bzhi bcu drug pa// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
65b7: sa ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi
65b8: rkang pa rnams ga/ bsngal zhes bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs

66a1: m a ma sa
66a2: mas cad byed pa pa gags par nyan thos kyis 'ang/ rangasas rgyas kyi yar yongs su bsngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang des rdzu 'drus gyi nang pa rnamasa'i zhes thabar dem migs pa'i nub byas
66a3: na cing dge 'an bathams par kyang nas bathams ca mkhyen pa nyid pa gartogs par nyanathos kyis dam/ rangs sa rgyas kyi sur mongs su brjod ma 'jug pa'o// gang des rdzu 'phrul gyid pa /
66a4: grong shes bya ba de ma dmigs pa'i rul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rdzab thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidas gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su ba
66a5: mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
66a6: gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos pon
66a7: cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi gang pa
66a8: rnams mngon par 'ang bya bamed ces bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid pa gags par nyi thos kyis

66b1: rangs ma rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor ma 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar dam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis cas ston cing dag pa'achab thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
66b2: cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i rdul byas
66b3: chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams
66b4: rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
66b5: bsngod pa 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing ma gtogs par
66b6: nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad
66b7: rnam pa thams ca sa khyen pa nyid ma mags par na thos byas ma/ rangs sa rgyas kyi yongs su brjo pa la ga po// gang sa gang po ma sa kya yangs ga
66b8: byas tshas ston pang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kya / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'ang/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su bsngor ma 'phru la bang po

67a1: s a sa
67a2: ma yongs su brjod ma 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dbang po rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tsham stan cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnas pa thams cad shes
67a3: ngam gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sang yongs su bsngod ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnam su smon pa med gyes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos son cing
67a4: ma pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mngon pa pa
67a5: da dag sa / su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/
67a6: / gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa
67a7: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams bsgom pa'i phying de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
67a8: chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams

67b1: mi rtag ces bya bar ris dmigs par tshus byas mam snyan cing dag pa' rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid ma gtags par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
67b2: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
67b3: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
67b4: rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar ngos dmigs pa
67b5: tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams
67b6: stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
67b7: ma 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
67b8: sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su sdong mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam

68a1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba de mi dmim
68a2: nga'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
68a3: stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
68a4: sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
68a5: par nya thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa
68a6: ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
68a7: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
68a8: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

68b1: g a su ga
68b2: s a
68b3: gu g+hAH sa da gas pa nam 'am/ ngas sargyas ma ma
68b4: bsngar ma 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams patshan mamang ces bya bar ngami dmigs pa'i rdul gyis chom ston cang dge rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mnyan
68b5: ma gtogs par can pas kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs pa rjor mi 'jug 'o// gang del byang chub kyi yan lagarnams smon pa med ces bya bar dem rnamags pa 'dul byas
68b6: nyon cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub
68b7: yan lag rnams mngon par 'dra bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
68b8: kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsab

69a1: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag/
69a2: rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
69a3: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
69a4: mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
69a5: nga'atshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
69a6: gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
69a7: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
69a8: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de mi

69b1: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
69b2: de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
69b3: kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
69b4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
69b5: par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
69b6: pa'o/ / gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
69b7: par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dag
69b8: pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems

70a1: dpa' sems dpa' can pa dag pa'i bshes gnyed na/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sa rtag ces bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mas ston cing dag pa chab bams/
70a2: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes
70a3: bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
70a4: 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
70a5: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
70a6: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de
70a7: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//
70a8: gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par

70b1: nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su bsngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa mang ces bya bar de mi dmamigs pa'i dul byas ces ston cang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams//
70b2: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba
70b3: med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
70b4: bsngong mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
70b5: nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
70b6: kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
70b7: tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
70b8: bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am

71a1: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
71a2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'ang ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams zhi shes bya bar dom dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
71a3: chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan
71a4: rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa pa yongs
71a5: su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'ingam
71a6: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
71a7: ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams mngon par
71a8: 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar

71b1: yongs su bsdongs 'jam pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gang na rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
71b2: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
71b3: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de
71b4: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo
71b5: 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
71b6: pa 'an thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
71b7: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar
71b8: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngod

72a1: ma 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chad mang pa rnam kyang sa bya ba sa dmigs pa rdul rgyas ma nya dag yen ba thams ca kyang / rnam pa sa pa dung can
72a2: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
72a3: ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tsha
72a4: med pa rnams ston pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i chu ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang ba
72a5: rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshad med pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos son cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
72a6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
72a7: ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams
72a8: bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su

72b1: bsngo 'i 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
72b2: ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
72b3: gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med/
72b4: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
72b5: sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge bar rtsa ba
72b6: thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
72b7: rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
72b8: yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa

73a1: da ma gas pa nas gyis / rang sa sa rnas ma sangams ba gas// gang la gzugs pa shems par 'ag nas su
73a2: sa thab ma migs pa ral mas cas na ci dag pa rtsa ba thams cad kya / rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid pa gtogs pa rnyan sa kyis 'ag/ rangasangs rgyas kyisang sangs sa nga
73a3: 'jug pa'o/ / gang ma gzugs med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams mngan par 'dubya ba med ces bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston cingad dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thangs pa
73a4: mabyin pa nyid ma gshegs par tha thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sang yongs su bsdang mi 'dug pa'o// nga de la gzugs med pa'i goms par 'dag pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dpar zags par
73a5: tshal gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su bsngod ma 'jug pa'o// gang delag
73a6: med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsdom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/
73a7: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
73a8: cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

73b1: kyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// thang de la rnam pa
73b2: thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
73b3: sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
73b4: gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
73b5: ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med ces
73b6: bya bar de mi dpags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
73b7: 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranya
73b8: thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing

74a1: dge ba'i na tha thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bsngong ma 'dug pa'o// gang dang
74a2: rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshum gyu ci rton cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
74a3: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
74a4: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag
74a5: rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
74a6: sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
74a7: cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
74a8: 'jug pa dgu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ ra

74b1: m asas gang la sa sag rnas par ga pa na pa dam ga @
74b2: @#sa mams ma 'dug pa la/ / dpa bar byas pa mas pa
74b3: ba ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan rdzas kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su ba
74b4: mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma nam med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
74b5: mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa med ces bya bar
74b6: de med migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
74b7: 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
74b8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'i// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bya/

75a1: bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
