142b6: pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
142b7: su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
142b8: tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

143a1: bya ba med par/ tshul khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
143a2: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
143a3: tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
143a4: la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de//
143a5: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa skrod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
143a6: pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
143a7: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
143a8: kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya ba

143b1: yid la byed de/ bshegs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang brlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad
143b2: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
143b3: sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yang la
143b4: phred de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
143b5: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
143b6: rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
143b7: byed de/ dpags pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
143b8: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyi dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang

144a1: rlob sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa
144a2: bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs zi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
144a3: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po stong pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
144a4: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dwe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ro// rnam pa thams
144a5: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ be'i kham ma dang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dong stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
144a6: su byed do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
144a7: tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
144a8: ba med par/ / me'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

144b1: phyir pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de legs pa'i tshul gyis stong
144b2: stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me
144b3: chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
144b4: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlol
144b5: sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams 'dus byas stong pazhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dpag
144b6: pa'i tshul gyis 'das byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
144b7: la bya ba med par/ me'i khams 'das ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rAm sems su byed do// de shis
144b8: pa rab tu phyin pas gyung ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams mtha' las 'das bsod panas thab mi byed/ gas

145a1: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da
145a2: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshal gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
145a3: rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
145a4: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
145a5: pa' yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
145a6: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
145a7: thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
145a8: me'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol

145b1: tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yang la bya ba mang por/ me'i khams mang migs pa song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa tshul byas pa
145b2: 'od kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ lo khams dpa
145b3: med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la bya nga/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems sa byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi pal stod pa'
145b4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
145b5: kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams dngos po med pa' nga nyidi stong pa zhes bya bar
145b6: yid la bad de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
145b7: pa de shes rab kyi pha de la tu yin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bad de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
145b8: stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnas pa thams cad mkhyen pa da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rung ba

146a1: khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
146a2: spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
146a3: pa nyid kyis kyang rlo ma sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya
146a4: bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
146a5: dang ldan pa'o yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
146a6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
146a7: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
146a8: par/ rlung gi khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi

146b1: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
146b2: ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
146b3: ra/ rlung gi khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// /
146b4: dashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmitra
146b5: pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
146b6: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
146b7: su byed par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
146b8: pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

147a1: yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
147a2: kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes
147a3: bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
147a4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
147a5: pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams dngos po med pa stong
147a6: pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
147a7: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lo// stong pa nyid
147a8: kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid

147b1: stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngos nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// rab 'bar gdar ya
147b2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha' khams na star pa nas
147b3: yid la byed de/ dpags pa'i tshul byas dang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
147b4: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
147b5: su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de//
147b6: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid /
147b7: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
147b8: sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

148a1: byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen tha stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
148a2: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
148a3: kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar
148a4: yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
148a5: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid/
148a6: kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams mtha' la 'das pa stong
148a7: pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
148a8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong

148b1: pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'
148b2: khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
148b3: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong
148b4: kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams chos thams cad
148b5: stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
148b6: pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid
148b7: stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
148b8: nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de

149a1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams dngos po med pa spyod pa zhes
149a2: bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
149a3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
149a4: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam
149a5: @mkha'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem
149a6: su byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
149a7: bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
149a8: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar

149b1: yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phye stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
149b2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
149b3: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
149b4: rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
149b5: do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
149b6: bye dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa
149b7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams don dam pa stong pa'oso bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa
149b8: nyid kyang dam gsal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

150a1: med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
150a2: rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus ma byas
150a3: stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
150a4: la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
150a5: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
150a6: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang
150a7: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam
150a8: par shes pa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

150b1: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
150b2: byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
150b3: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad sto/
150b4: pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
150b5: rnam par shes pa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
150b6: sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par bar/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa
150b7: stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
150b8: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshug

151a1: kyis dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la snang pa'/ rnam pa thams cad
151a2: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rab nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ stong/
151a3: pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
151a4: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/
151a5: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
151a6: ma rig pa nang snang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang nga migs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
151a7: spong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa phye thor pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
151a8: la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa bya

151b1: nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi rlung stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
151b2: la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
151b3: tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
151b4: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
151b5: kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa don dam
151b6: pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
151b7: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
151b8: byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan

152a1: pa yang la bya ba zad par/ ma reg pa 'dus pa byas snang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
152a2: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
152a3: dag pa batha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
152a4: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya
152a5: bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
152a6: byed pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul ces
152a7: derab med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
152a8: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis

152b1: kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan par yang la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa chos thams
152b2: cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
152b3: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed / dmigs/
152b4: tshul thos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
152b5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa
152b6: nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
152b7: la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
152b8: kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma reg pa ngo bo nyid

153a1: nga/ lags la byas ga pa dang gas/ du ga/ sa ba
153a2: pal myong pa'i / dam pa thams cad mthun pa'i nga sa pa'i yod la / rig pa ma pa mad pa banyid pong pa yid byed pa// migs pa
153a3: la da gas/ sems su bye // byo sa
153a4: rol tu phyin pa la skyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la byab med pang / 'du byed rang stong ba zhes bya ba yong la byed / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang sto pa
153a5: kyang dmigs la/ sto pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyedan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byab me par
153a6: 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
153a7: la sdong po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams rje de mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa ring /
153a8: da kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis mang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa la spyod pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yad

153b1: byab mer papa 'du byer stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa/ dbigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
153b2: rangagi pa tu ben pal spong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chen po stong pazhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
153b3: sa de bskong padakyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
153b4: yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
153b5: su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
153b6: byed de/ dalegs pa'i tshul gyis 'dres byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
153b7: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus ma/ byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma
153b8: byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

154a1: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das
154a2: pa spong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
154a3: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma nga tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
154a4: kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
154a5: ba med par/ 'du byed dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngor bo med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
154a6: sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes
154a7: bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
154a8: spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'dra byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya ba ri yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

154b1: thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'ang dang ldan pa'i yang
154b2: bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
154b3: su bang ngo / / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
154b4: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
154b5: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
154b6: dkyis kyang rlopa sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
154b7: bar yid la bar de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spad ba'im/ rnam pa
154b8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid

155a1: kya rnam sems pa kyang / / 5kyang gzhan sa sa sa pa
155a2: rnam pa thams mkhyer pashing dang ldan pa'i ying la ba bskyed par/ rnam par shes pa nang song pa zhes bya ba yang la byed de/ ngasags pa'i bram sa
155a3: pas kyang rnamasems su byed nga / / dashes rab kyi par ma du phyin pa stong / rnas pathams dang sa ldan pa nga da ldan pa'i mdul byes gas pa byas
155a4: zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed // de shes rab kyi bar la byed pal spya
155a5: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
155a6: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa stong
155a7: nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
155a8: che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po song pa nyid kyang dmigasal

155b1: gang bshid kyis kyang rloms pas saze / / rigs rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la stsa / rnam pa thams cang mthun pa nyid dang ldan par yang la bya ba med pang / rnam par shes pang dngam btang
155b2: bya bar yid la byed de/ / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
155b3: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
155b4: kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngo / / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya
155b5: bar yid la byed de/ bamigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
155b6: dang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med sa / rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
155b7: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye / / de shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnas par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa
155b8: song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

156a1: rnam pa thams cad brkyen pa nyid dang ldan par yongal bya ba mang bar/ ma shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs du kyis der ba pad nga stong pa nyid kyang nga
156a2: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes byapa
156a3: yid la byeng ngo / / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
156a4: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
156a5: sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa rang gi batshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
156a6: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rdzob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol ba phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
156a7: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ kyang rlom sems su
156a8: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i

156b1: tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
156b2: rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
156b3: tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
156b4: nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
156b5: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
156b6: de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs byi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis kyi
156b7: stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlopa sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming
156b8: dang gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigasol/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la

157a1: spyod pa'i tshe/ rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
157a2: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs chen po stong pa nyid zhes
157a3: bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnal pa thams cad
157a4: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dpags pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
157a5: rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
157a6: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'das byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sred pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ldan pa nyid dang lda pa
157a7: yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs 'dus sa byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
157a8: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la b+ha ba med par/ ming dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i

157b1: rgyas kyis mtha' las 'das pa song pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ so pa nyid kyis pang rlom sems sa byed do// de shes rabakyi la spyod byen pa la spyod 'i tshe/ rum pa thams pa mkhyen pa nyid dang su kyi'i ba sa
157b2: med pang / ming dang gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
157b3: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong
157b4: pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs rang
157b5: bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
157b6: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang /
157b7: rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
157b8: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

158a1: yid la bya ba med par/ yang dang gzug pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
158a2: dashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos pa
158a3: byed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mad dang
158a4: gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i ro/ rngam pa
158a5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
158a6: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po lnga bcu gnyis pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
158a7: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyecu pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
158a8: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched dag pa stong pa zhes bya bar

158b1: yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dpags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang
158b2: bya ba med par/ skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
158b3: spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stor
158b4: pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
158b5: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
158b6: med par/ se par da drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
158b7: la spong ba'i tshe/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
158b8: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar

159a1: yid la byed pa/ dmig pa ny+dza ral gyis 'dras ma byas stong pa nyid kying dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
159a2: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya zad par/ skye mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song
159a3: dkyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
159a4: bya bar yid la byad de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
159a5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
159a6: kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / re shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ma cang drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
159a7: byed pa/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhan stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
159a8: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba meng par/ mched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

159b1: yid la byed pa/ dmig lams 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skang dam pa thams
159b2: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ skye mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song
159b3: dkyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug thob ma dang tha ma med pa sta
159b4: bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
