159b6: kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mardar dag rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
159b7: byed pa/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
159b8: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgyu mched drug chos thams cad spang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul rjes chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su

160a1: yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du smin pa la
160a2: spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo
160a3: sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
160a4: gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
160a5: pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
160a6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
160a7: sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
160a8: tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasepas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

160b1: ba med par/ reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du pyid
160b2: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
160b3: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par / reg pa mtha' las
160b4: 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
160b5: spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
160b6: nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyis pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dong
160b7: med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
160b8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang

161a1: chom sems pa byed do/ / nga shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa chos thams cad song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
161a2: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
161a3: yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes pa
161a4: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma dmigs pa stong
161a5: pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dngos po
161a6: med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
161a7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
161a8: rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

161b1: dadamigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi sa
161b2: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
161b3: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
161b4: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
161b5: med par/ tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
161b6: marnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par / tshong ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
161b7: rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
161b8: gyis can pa stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/

162a1: tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
162a2: la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
162a3: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
162a4: la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nga
162a5: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
162a6: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
162a7: gyis tho pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
162a8: med par/ tshar ba dong ba mad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

162b1: la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
162b2: nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
162b3: de/ dmigs pa'i tshul kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
162b4: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmi gos la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
162b5: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
162b6: gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmi gso la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
162b7: par/ tshor bar nges pa med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
162b8: du phyin pa la spyod pa'itshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tsher ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs

163a1: la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tsher bdangos po med
163a2: pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang bde dub
163a3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs
163a4: pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
163a5: sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
163a6: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de//
163a7: de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid
163a8: stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa chen po

163b1: stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
163b2: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis den dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
163b3: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
163b4: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
163b5: sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
163b6: spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
163b7: kyang dmigs la/ song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srad pa thob
163b8: dang thar med pa song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

164a1: la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed dang / 'phags pa'argal gis de ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang
164a2: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su med do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pang / sred pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid
164a3: la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dang ldan pa
164a4: yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
164a5: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa rang gi mar na nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
164a6: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya
164a7: bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis me dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
164a8: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

164b1: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
164b2: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
164b3: stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
164b4: dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
164b5: stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa phye
164b6: stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
164b7: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
164b8: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

165a1: kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'ang drang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa chen po
165a2: ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol pa phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
165a3: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa don daM pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
165a4: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
165a5: la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ljon pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
165a6: la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
165a7: ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
165a8: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i

165b1: n a ma
165b2: byab sa dpapa yin pa ra ba meng pastong pa zhes bya bar yang 'byed de/ dmigs pa'i rgyal gyis dring bamed pa sngang ba dmigs pa/ kyis kyang rnamam ma sa cad /
165b3: phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
165b4: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya
165b5: bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
165b6: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
165b7: do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs
165b8: pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dngos po

166a1: meng mthong pags bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngam po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rdzoms dus su da / dbus rabakyi pa sa tu byin pa la sto 'i
166a2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya sa med par/ len pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang b.legs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
166a3: kyang ngo / / re shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
166a4: rnal gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
166a5: pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
166a6: rlom soms su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa phyi stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
166a7: kyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ srid pa
166a8: phyi dang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa

166b1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
166b2: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong
166b3: pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa don dam pa
166b4: stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
166b5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
166b6: sems su byed ro/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dung ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
166b7: pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
166b8: med sa bya ba med par/ srid pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ snang pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams

167a1: byed do/ / de shes pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snang pa kyog sa dang bra pa myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
167a2: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
167a3: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
167a4: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigasde pa'i tshul
167a5: gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
167a6: meng bang / srid pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
167a7: rangab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
167a8: gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba

167b1: med par/ srid pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
167b2: pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa
167b3: stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa ngo ba
167b4: nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
167b5: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/
167b6: la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
167b7: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
167b8: rol tu phyin pa la sred parnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/

168a1: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar
168a2: yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
168a3: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
168a4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa
168a5: nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgrub
168a6: do dadam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
168a7: spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
168a8: lo/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba 'dus ma byas stong pa

168b1: zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa
168b2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
168b3: la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
168b4: pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
168b5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de dmigs la/
168b6: stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba rang bzhan stong pa zhes bya bar
168b7: yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad
168b8: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis

169a1: kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
169a2: zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
169a3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
169a4: pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
169a5: yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kying dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
169a6: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
169a7: byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
169a8: pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dpags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab

169b1: pha rol du byen pa la spong ba ra / rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul kyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
169b2: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi stong pa
169b3: shes bzar yid la byed de/ bsags pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
169b4: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi dang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
169b5: su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
169b6: tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
169b7: la bya ba med par/ rga shi chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du
169b8: byed pa la spyod pa'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rgagadon dpapa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi

170a1: dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus
170a2: pas stong pa zhes pa bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
170a3: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
170a4: kyis kyang rlom sems sa byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
170a5: la bar de/ dmigs pa'i rlo kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
170a6: pa len pa zhing dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
170a7: su byed ngo / / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spod ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
170a8: byed de/ dang ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

170b1: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 'dubya ba med pas rga shi rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/
170b2: de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi ni chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
170b3: gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
170b4: yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
170b5: do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga sha mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
170b6: gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
170b7: bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos po med pa stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
170b8: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

171a1: gang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
171a2: rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab
171a3: 'byor gzhan yang bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa // dran pa nye bar
171a4: gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
171a5: pa'i tshe/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yang dag par spyod pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang dmigs la/ yang dag
171a6: par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
171a7: sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
171a8: pa thams cad mkhyen bya nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dbang po rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang dmigs la/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

171b1: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/ stobs de
171b2: dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom ste/ dmigs
171b3: pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang dmigs la/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
171b4: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgad pa de yang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i lam
171b5: yan lag brgyad pa des kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
171b6: sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
171b7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de dag kyang dmigs la/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom
171b8: sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa

172a1: s a ga na sa gsu
172a2: bzugan ma pa' mams par 'jug pa rnams spros te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang dmigs la/ gzugs sa pa'i rnam
172a3: kyang rnam sems su byed do/ / dashes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa rnams thos pa// mas
172a4: tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems pa byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
172a5: dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/
172a6: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
172a7: bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag kyang
172a8: dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

172b1: pa nyid dang ldar pa'i yid la bya ba ma ra/ sbyin pa ga smra pa rnams snyoms/ dmigs ba nam gyis mngon par shes pa deg kyang dang // mngon pa grus pa de dag gis kyang nom sem pa pa byed //
172b2: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stod pa' tsha/ rnam mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la khya ba med pang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sos ste/ dmigs pa'i gyis kyid yang ri de dag kyang dmigs
172b3: ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sra /
172b4: pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'ang dang ldan
172b5: yid la bya ba med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kya
172b6: rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skrod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi
172b7: 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mi 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ so
172b8: so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol

173a1: dargyan pas5/ rnam pathams ca napa da lda yang sa byabs dpang / rje da / dmigs par tshus byam ma dpags pa//
173a2: des kyang chub sems su byed de// rigs rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gad pa'i te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba med dpang / sangs rgyas gyi rnam pa 'dres pa rnams skems/ dmigs
173a3: de'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi ches pa 'dres pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dadag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/
173a4: shes rabakyi pa la dbyin pa skyed zug bcwag// bas pa lnga bcu gsus pa// rab byo byang namasamasu dpa'i sems dpapa'i po shes rab kyi pha rol du gyin pa la spyod pa'i rje/ dam
173a5: mi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'de bas na 'jigs shing sdang la grag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa
173a6: grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing da dang skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sreg par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
173a7: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin
173a8: pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la smod pa mos pa med par byed

173b1: ci zlog par byed pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni ba/
173b2: gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni ches ma yin 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis 'di la bslab par bya ba ni mche'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar
173b3: mi bya'o/ / bcad par mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
173b4: chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag bya
173b5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas pha rol du phyin pa dag las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsams
173b6: kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyer la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig b+ha/ tshul khrims
173b7: rol du chen po bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ ston pa'i pha la du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang
173b8: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por ri/ bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig tocan dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

174a1: drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng ga' sa par 'das par nga skyes pa'i dab pa dang /
174a2: shin du rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byang ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yos su ston to zhes 'dod kyil pa rnam pa
174a3: 'di lta bu dag mi sgra me ston pa ra/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig te can dag sangs rgyas kyin byad du byas shing / byang chub
174a4: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang chung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par
174a5: r dzogs pa'i byang chub tu maben par rdzogs par 'chang bya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu bdud kyi las dag mi smra ma ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig
174a6: bar bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag
174a7: gis stong ngo / / rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce ni bdag kam bdag gis stong ngo // lus ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
174a8: gzugs na bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phran padag gam bdag gis stong ngo do// dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo do// ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo do// rig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong do// chos ni bdag

174b1: gam bdag gis stang nga/ / mig ga rnam par shes par 'gags sa/ la pa' rnam par gas pa na bdag gas bdag gas kyang // la rnam par shes pa na bdag gam bdagagis stong // sgo rnam par shes par
174b2: bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdagags bdag gis
174b3: stong ngo / / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bya dag gis stong do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
174b4: bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
174b5: tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gas dag gis stong do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
174b6: rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag
174b7: sa song ngo / / me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stod do// nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam
174b8: bdag gis stong ngo / / ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gas stong do// 'du byed na bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ming dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis

175a1: seM dang / sa mched dag na bdag gam bdag gis sa nga/ reg pa bdag gam bdag gis sno dang/ char ban bdag gam bdag gis sna dang/ sa pa'i bdag gas bdag gis gang / la ba
175a2: gam bdag gis stong ngo / sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis
175a3: spong ngo / / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis so/
175a4: bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid/
175a5: bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // don dam
175a6: pastong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
175a7: bdagag pa bdag gis song ngo / / theg ma dang ba ma med pa snang pa nyidi ni bdag gas bdag gis stong nga / der bamed pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gas bdag gis song/ rang ba'in stong pa nyid de bdag gas pa
175a8: gis spong ngo / / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis song ngo //

175b1: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis song ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gapa bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar
175b2: gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dbang po rnams na
175b3: bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gapa
175b4: bdag gis stong ngo / / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshad mang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ma
175b5: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gapa bdag gis sto
175b6: ro/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang ston pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo do// mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag
175b7: gis stong ngo / / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gas snang ngo // nga bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // so so
175b8: yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gas stong/ snying rje chen pon bdagag pa bdag gis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gas bdag gis song ngo // de ltar bdag dang

176a1: bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ lung ci zhig bya zhes zar ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi swA/ ma ston pa 'di ni byang chub sem
176a2: dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig tocan dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du byed
176a3: te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi ba shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems
176a4: dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do/ / nyan thos shes bya ba yang med do// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
176a5: 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med/ nyan thos shes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba
176a6: 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas
176a7: byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pa'i drung du byin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing / nyan thos dung rangasangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byabs
176a8: 'dims shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mo smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig te

176b1: can dag mkha pa dang srebar bar kyar byung du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ldan par byung ldan te/ byang chub sems dpa spyod pa las klog cing / rnam thathams cad mthun pa nyang ldan pa
176b2: yid la bya ba las bzlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnam
176b3: la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyong ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la stong bya dang / tshad mang
176b4: pa rnams la sbyor ba dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid
176b5: mtshan ma med pa dang ston pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su soms la nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
176b6: gyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i thogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdug ton+dan
176b7: dag pa dang ma'i dbyang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di gad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas khya la cinag bya/
176b8: don du ni bskal pa pod mod pa grangs mod par 'khor ban 'khor zhing rgyal ga dang mag gcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la chun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon dbyar yod pa dang / lan gyi/

177a1: da tha nas na na dun
177a2: dra rung kyilas rag mi ma skad pa 'ad / byang chubasams dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i drug pa'i rdzogs par dag par byab// rab byong gan yang bad theg dag dgaslong gi
177a3: nga byang chub sems dpa sapas dpa' chen po'i drung du phyir te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag mang thos byas
177a4: dpazhi zhes bya ba dang / stang zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'dra bya ba med nas bya ba dang / dbyen zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
177a5: tshor rab mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa
177a6: med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes sdug thang/
177a7: zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan pa med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / sdodan par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
177a8: zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /

177b1: stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba/
177b2: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba
177b3: dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /

183a4: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smin pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes
183a5: byab 'apags pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
183a6: res bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes
183a7: ba dang / bang gi med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya brje mig
183a8: po'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan pa med ces bya

183b1: dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
183b2: bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
183b3: ston pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma mod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba
183b4: dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi
183b5: sa bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba da mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi
183b6: rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
183b7: dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba
183b8: dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang

184a1: sdug partsal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces zla ba dang / zhe zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces zla ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dber ro
184a2: ga sa kyis ston pa nga / / yang dag par spong ba rnams mi ga ces bya ba dang / sdug pasngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag sa kris bya ba dang / gagis bya ba nga shes bya ba dang sa nam med pa
184a3: son pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / ba
184a4: ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa

184a7: ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang /
184a8: bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs

184b1: pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
184b2: smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /

184b6: mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces
184b7: bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ze dang / bdag mod ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya
184b8: bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / / rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /

185a1: ljon pa pa cas bya ba dang / ngan par 'dra bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa' rdul byas ston pa dang // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnabs ma rtag cas za ba dang /
185a2: ka bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya bab de ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
185a3: 'tshal gyis ston pa dang / zam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes
185a4: dag pa na ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang
185a5: sa la zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmig
185a6: ston pa dang / shing 'dun rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan pa med ces bya ba dang / khyim pa med
185a7: mngon par 'du bya ba mang cas bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // gzugs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba da ga
185a8: shes pa gangs gang zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dpagis pa'i tshul gyis

185b1: pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba

185b6: pa dang / bdon par 'ang byab med pas bya ba dang / dban gas bya bar da rigs pa'i rnam gyis nyan pa dang // 'ang rnga zad pa rtag cas bya ba dang / ga bsngal la bya ba dang /
185b7: dang / mi za ba dang mtshan pa mang sa bya ba ga ston pa med ces pa ba dang / bdan par 'du bya ba ma ces bya ba dang / dpan 'as bya bar dpags pa'i rgyal gyis gyud pa dang // spangs
185b8: n a can la

186a1: ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
186a2: sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po rnams rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o// /
186a3: sa rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bdun no// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brga ba// bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
186a4: sa/ / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang legs/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
186a5: sa bdang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gdon na tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang makres
186a6: bdang/ raba'i thang byang chub la yang migs / sems can la yang tshig sa pas/ de'i phying byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi dan ni tshig ga ni med pa'o// rab 'byor 'das ste/ dab rnam mkha' la bya'i rjes
186a7: nga na 'a/ 9 / lal la ga nga mas ga
186a8: na ga/ sa nan da/

186b1: ga don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rku zla la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpongon sgra brnyan la gnas med do// rab 'byor de

186b3: dper na gzugs brnyan la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor

186b5: 'di lta ste dper ro de bzhin nyid la gnas med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de

186b7: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na chos nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na chos kyi dbyings la gnas med do// rab
