265b3: bdugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkad ste/ mos par byam
265b4: sheng rnam par spyod do/ / de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gzugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi
265b5: dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po
265b6: s hin du yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med ba gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs
265b7: bain rgyas par bgang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
265b8: yid la mi byed pas nam mkha'i mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/

266a1: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nga rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
266a2: zang ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la
266a3: me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'dir /
266a4: dang tshad med pa 'de dag dang gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba
266a5: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
266a6: bzhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yongs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gzugs med pa gnod pa med
266a7: brjod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsdams pas 'dig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa rnam sa la'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs pa byas par bag / mos par byas gang ma par thod /
266a8: na sa ya ma ga di na 'ad sa

266b1: pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ / de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yongs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs
266b2: med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na ma mkha'i sa tham gtugs pa'i phyogs parda rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas
266b3: rnam par spyod do/ / snyoms dang ldan pa'i sem rgya chen po shin du yongs pa mig tsha med pa gtsug med pa gnod pa med po stong pa med pa yongasasu rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas
266b4: jig rten chos kyis dbyings kyis klas par ba mkha'i mthas gzugs pa'i rigs bcu rgyas par dkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spong ngo // de 'dod pas dben sdig mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog
266b5: pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam par rtos pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye ba bzhi nas nad yongs su dang
266b6: sems kyi rmad gcig du gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bslabs te gnas so/ de dga' ba
266b7: las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde 'alus kyis khyod la 'phags pa rnams kyi sa de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o/
266b8: zhes bzod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsapa gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang skabs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nug pas bde ba napa med kyis bsngal/

267a1: yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i gsam gtan bzha pa la nye bar bsgrubs tu gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs
267a2: pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams
267a3: cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes nam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam
267a4: shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes du ma zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du chud zad med pa'i skye mched las yang
267a5: dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
267a6: chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba sa nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
267a7: gzhan la brjod cing 'chang pa dang ston cing 'grol la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang de dag gi byon dang 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
267a8: po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bsam gtan dang tshad med pa gzugs med pa'i

267b1: snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par lngar yang de'i tshe/ nyan thos sam// rang sangs rgyas kyi yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan theg ma 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
267b2: mas dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi ba rol du phyin pa mnyams pa'o/ / da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la byabs bas pa gtan
267b3: nga zang pang pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir ros bstan to// pa dras pa
267b4: yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rtog pa dang sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// na pa byang chub sems dpa'
267b5: sapas dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can
267b6: thams cad kyi don dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sepas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam par chub
267b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byabs bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang sems par 'jug pa rnams lam
267b8: par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar me ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam byang rabs

268a1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams namakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsapa gtan
268a2: gsum pa'i yan lag dang / bsapa gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye
268a3: mched dang / cung zad med pa'i kye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong
268a4: pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab du rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag
268a5: gis rlom sems pad pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
268a6: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa 'theg pa chen po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhan
268a7: pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang po lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
268a8: cad du stobs lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags

268b1: na rnamasags pa dag / rnam parnams cad dubs pagatanadamasasas pa dang / rnam pathams dang ma dbang parnapasags pa dag rnam pa thams cad dug sa rnams par
268b2: rnams thob pa pa dam pa thams da rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad nga ma par thar pa'o/
268b3: slong ba ngang pa ngan pa med pa dang thon pa brla ba sa pa dang rnam pa thams cad du mngan pa shes pa rnams slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ting 'dir rnams mab pa dang / rnab pa thams cad drug
268b4: rnamasagapa pa dang / rnam pa tham cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams thom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams snyam pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa
268b5: rnams thob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po skam pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang /
268b6: rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad dul bgyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid som pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
268b7: bshang dra ba'o bu 'das pang rabasams dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa ran po'o/ / me dang ldan pa shAr dwa to bu gzhan yang bang rngubs pas dpa' sams dpa' chen po byams par ting na
268b8: nyes par ga ba gags/ sems can thams cad yangs su bsab par bya'o gis de la gzhas par byad// 'ad pa snyom par gan sa mams 'a

269a1: dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do// dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing // bdag nyid kyis grol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnamapa la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting /
269a2: de 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems cad rnams kyis zag pa bzod par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa
269a3: pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / napa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang ched med pa rnams kyi rnams dang / tshul dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang rnam pa thangs
269a4: da mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims
269a5: kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su mnyam pa'o/ / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres pa rnam
269a6: par spyod cing sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed ci rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad
269a7: med pa'i rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bsad pas ma dge ba'i chos
269a8: rnams rab tu spang ba dang dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtor bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med rnams la

269b1: spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tho bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la
269b2: yang mernam par gzhog la bas pa gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la de dag gis 'phrogs
269b3: par yang la 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
269b4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la de
269b5: ngag la mi rtog pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i dam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par
269b6: rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
269b7: ti'i bu 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' se pas dpa' chen po'i theg pa rin po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po ni nang stong pa nyi
269b8: shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa yin/ phyi dang stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ deng

270a1: pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul
270a2: gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang
270a3: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin
270a4: stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
270a5: ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i rdul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs
270a6: pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
270a7: theg pa chen po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'jug cing / mnyas par gzhag par
270a8: shes pa kye/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa

270b1: nu ban/ / dgaces bya bar shes pas 'jug/ ga sa bya ba shes pa ma 'jug pa dang / ba gas bya bar shes pa pa 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag rgyas
270b2: shes pa mi 'jug/ bdag med cem bya bar shes par mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni dom dmigs
270b3: pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen pa ni 'dod pa'i
270b4: khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/
270b5: dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' se pas
270b6: dpa' chen de'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag padag cab pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dngangangs
270b7: mabyas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'du ba byas dang / 'das panas kyi yarnams tung
270b8: she pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de med migs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// sbas pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po rdzas

271a1: ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po theg pa chen po la gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
271a2: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa'
271a3: yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la
271a4: yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
271a5: dag par gnas kyang des tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na
271a6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpal
271a7: sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang mi
271a8: dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i

271b1: pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
271b2: gnas kyang / des bcad 'phru med pags/ brtson 'bras kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs yid la bya ba de dag kyang
271b3: na par chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med migs pa'i tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas she 'o/ tshe dang 'ad la
271b4: ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bas pa gangan yang dmig/ bsam
271b5: gtan bye pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i
271b6: byas bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
271b7: shes dbyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / nas dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rted las 'das pa dang / 'as byas
271b8: byas dang / zag pa dang btas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang med migs shing / shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi rol phyin pa ma tsha migs byang chums ma par mi dmigs

272a1: yang la bya bar dag kyang ma dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul thas/ shes rab bya pa la du phyin pa la yang dag par gan
272a2: shes bya'o/ / nga dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa
272a3: rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ brtsom pa rnam par bsgom
272a4: pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid skom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
272a5: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
272a6: gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chen po
272a7: stong pa nyid skom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa
272a8: nyid sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom

272b1: so/ / dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa don du ri mi dpabs par tshu la sa/ 'dum ma byas stong pa nyid slom 'o// ram
272b2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du dom dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mtha' las radas btang pa ci sarnam
272b3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la zab ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bskod pa'i don du des dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tham pad bsod pa nyid rnam mo// rnam pa thams
272b4: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rngam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi ba/ dor ba med pa song pa nyid sgom po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
272b5: nyid dang ldan pa'i yi da la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmims pa'i tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
272b6: yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sa
272b7: 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du dem dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid slom mo// rnam pa thams cad lakhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/
272b8: bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mi dmigs pa thong ba nyid thos mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la khyabs dres pas/ bas pa ba

273a1: par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam
273a2: par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
273a3: du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
273a4: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
273a5: pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi skom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
273a6: ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
273a7: bsgob pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ / dbang po lnga bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
273a8: pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ / stobs lnga bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs

273b1: pa'i tshul gyis/ / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de ma dmigs pa'i tshul
273b2: gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i
273b3: tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
273b4: bsam gtan bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom
273b5: mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom
273b6: mo rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo// rnam pa thams
273b7: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom mo// rnam pa
273b8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin

274a1: zham gnas pa thams cad mabyen pa dang ldan pa yod la byabs 'dres pas/ bgos pa nas par bgos can ngang drang ma dngags par nus byang/ mngan ba gas pa rnams
274a2: skosgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa
274a3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
274a4: pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
274a5: nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
274a6: la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma
274a7: 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po posgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam
274a8: par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen

274b1: po la yang dag par nas shes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dra ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/
274b2: chub sems dpa' shes bya pa 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshor
274b3: bzhes bya ba'ang na mang tsam du zad do/ / 'du shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'du shes shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dra byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
274b4: zang / / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig ces bya ba 'don ming tsam du zad do// rna ba dmigs
274b5: sa pab 'di ni mer tsam du zad do/ / snga dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ snga zhes bya ba 'di ni med tsam du zad do// lce dmigs su mang ba'i phyir/ lce zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang //
274b6: sa ma par/ shes pa pa 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid ces bya ba 'don mong tsam du zad do// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs
274b7: ma cam zad / / sa su rang pa'i phyir/ sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dri dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dri zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ro dmigs su mang
274b8: pa ma za dang / / rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ reg ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos shes bya ba 'di ni med tsam du zad do//

275a1: mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ na
275a2: ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce'i rnam par shes pa
275a3: dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
275a4: zad ro/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi 'dus te/
275a5: reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i
275a6: phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mang tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lho'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di na ming tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs
275a7: su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mig
275a8: gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba

275b1: legs/ med pa bIr/ raba'i 'dug te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'dan mong tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba 'tshar ba ri migs dpa' phyir
275b2: las na pa'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ca ba zhes bya ba 'a na mang
275b3: tsam du/ // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mang tsam du zad do// 'dus te reg pa
275b4: ma lda par tshar ba dmigs su mang ba'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sa khams dmigs su med pa' phyir/ sa
275b5: gas ma sa sa byu na sus / / ba sa ga
275b6: xxx/ xxx
275b7: xxx/ xxx
275b8: xxx/ xxx

276a1: ming tsam du zad do/ / ming dang gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ming dang gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// skye mched drug dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ skye mched
276a2: drug ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ / reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
276a3: sred pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// len pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ len pa ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// srid pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
276a4: srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rga shi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de
276a5: sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dmas su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi
276a6: pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
276a7: phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin
276a8: zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i

276b1: phyir rang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ / phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phye stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
276b2: da stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chen po stong panyid dpags su
276b3: med pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dor dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'dus byas
276b4: nga pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyis ces bya ba 'di ni ming
276b5: du zad do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su
276b6: med pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de/
276b7: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba'ing
276b8: ni ming tsam du zad do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mi dmig/

277a1: pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsab du zad do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs
277a2: su med pa'i phyir/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
277a3: zang ngo / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ba'i zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag par
277a4: spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ba sen las dmigs su med pa'i phyir dbang po lde zhes bya bzhin
277a5: ming tsam du mno/ / stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni
277a6: ming tsam du zad do/ / lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i
277a7: bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ / bsam gtan rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshad med pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir//
277a8: tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming

277b1: n an rdzun
277b2: da de sa / / rnam pa thang 'angs tha panyid da ma can ma med pa dang ldan pa med pa mig pa med pa
277b3: par zer pa'i mo stong panyid dang mtshan pa med pa dang smon pa ring pa'is bya ba 'di ni mi tsam du zad do/ / mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'dir mang
277b4: du zad do/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo/ zhes bya ba 'din ma
277b5: tsam du zad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam su zad do// mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs pa med pa'i
277b6: pir/ mi 'jigs pa ba'i zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa ba'i zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ting rje
277b7: po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ces bya bar/
277b8: ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// pha nor ba de bzhin nyid dam ga su med pa'i phyir/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad

278a1: gzhan ma yin pa bzhan dmigs sa med pa byur/ gzhan ma yin par bzhin tad cas bya ba ba ni mang tsam duzang nga// chos nyid dmigs phra med pa' byar/ rom tsam
278a2: 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ / chos kyi dbyings dmigs pa med pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos kyi gnas nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'dzin
278a3: rang ngamar zad / / tsam sngon med par bags su med pa 'byor/ chab stan meng pa zhes bya pa 'an ma tsam du byedang/ yad dag pa mtha' dmigs su me par byar/ yang dag pa' ma'a' zhes bya ba dang /
278a4: mang ma za nga// byang chub dmigs sa med pa gyur/ byang chub cas bya ba 'a ni ming tsam du ba da// sangs kyi sa migs su med pa byang / sangs tu pa rnam bya ba mong sa ma zad pa// sa bya
278a5: yang dag par shes te/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA rar ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes byan/
278a6: shes rab kyi pa ram du phyir pa kyang zag bca / bam pa dag bca pa// cha dung ldan pa shA d+ha ba gzhan yang byung chub skams dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bstang nam/
278a7: byang chub la 'dug gi bar mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byab shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang /
278a8: rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi na

278b1: nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gre'o/ / sangs rgyas sem ldan 'das de dag las kyang/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa 'ang nyid kyi chos can // de byang chub seg pa pa'i theg pa de la gnas /
278b2: sangs rgyas pazhi nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing da 'gre gang/ sangs rgyas kyi'ang yongs pa dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sa sa rgyas kyi nang gsang shes kyang mi 'tha/
278b3: sems can gyi 'du shes kyang ma 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'thung ngo // de gnyis su med pa' ma la gnas shing / lus ji lta bas sems can rnams kyi ngan bya ba'i mthu med pa des
278b4: lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin te/ / den ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa de dang nam du yang me 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad
278b5: mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob ras kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lngam yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / ma 'am ca dang / bye chen po dang /
278b6: mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzag mams 'thor bar ma nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab du skarar// de tha na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/
278b7: phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga' klung gi ba ma ser dgang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjed pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub
278b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen pa/ bla ra med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

279a1: thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
279a2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ga mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i thag
279a3: pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing
279a4: dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do/ / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten
279a5: gyi khams che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
279a6: ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi
279a7: bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po
279a8: bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes

279b1: grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do/ / bang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams
279b2: yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam
279b3: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs
279b4: mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems
279b5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang /
279b6: chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
279b7: 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas
279b8: 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo kor ba byed do zhes grags pa srog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do//

280a1: rab byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams
280a2: che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams
280a3: cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo sor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs
280a4: rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan rjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i
280a5: mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed de zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod
280a6: pa mdzad do/ / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang
280a7: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ / bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang //
280a8: chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed de// zhes grags pa srog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag

280b1: par gnas shes bya'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/ bcom
280b2: ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ca chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
280b3: pad ces bka' bral to/ / rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i gtso gyon cing 'di las/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i gca bgos// tshul khams kyi
280b4: dra byin pa'i kotsa bgos/ / bzod pa'i ba ral tu phyin pa'i go ca bgos// brjor 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i gon bgos// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i goca bgos// shes rab kya pha rol du phyin
280b5: pa'i gon bgos/ / nang stong pa nyid kyi go rtsa bgos// phyi steng pa nyid kyi go na bge ma// bi nang stong pa nyid kyi go tso bgos// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go tsa bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi go ca bgos// don rnam pa stong pa nyid kyi go tsa bgoso//
280b6: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi gca bags// 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid kye go bags// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go tsha phags// dor ba med pa
280b7: stong pa nyid kyi gor bgos/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi gon bgos// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go ma bgos// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos// me dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi sa
280b8: dngos pa med pa snang pa nyid kyi ga cha bgo sa/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gom bgos// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gocha bgos// @

281a1: dag par spong pa'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/ dbang po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos/ lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags
281a2: pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos/ tshad med pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
281a3: spoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos/ ting nge 'dzin gyi go ca bgos/ gzugs
281a4: kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go na bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
281a5: 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas
281a6: par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par
281a7: 'gengs so/ / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs
281a8: so/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang

281b1: bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
281b2: klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
281b3: gi bye ma med snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du rab tu spyod do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa
281b4: drug du rab du spyad do/ / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug du rab du spyod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyor
281b5: bang pogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu sbyong //
281b6: shar lde'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug
281b7: du rab tu sad do/ / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug du rab du spyod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa
281b8: dug tu rab du skad do/ / steng ga phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug du rab du spyod do// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ sems can dmyal

282a1: ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da la phyag 'tshal la shes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyang
282a2: sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang
282a3: de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsam
282a4: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shi bar byas te// de bzhin
282a5: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhe bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sba
282a6: thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ / de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas// sangs rgyas
282a7: gyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ / des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi
282a8: sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal

282b1: lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i cho ga shin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde bar ma gshin rje'i 'jag
282b2: rten de ga nas rnam par ldang ngo / / de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de
282b3: dag du ste'o/ / des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
282b4: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga'
282b5: dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs
282b6: sa bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ / des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa
282b7: bathams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs slob go// de'i tshe sems can dmya
282b8: ba'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba

283a1: dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o// des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
283a2: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la
283a3: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob / de dag dga' ba dang bde
283a4: ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / / de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
283a5: shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ / des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/
283a6: nga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sa
283a7: kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas
283a8: kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang kwa'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/

283b1: mas can dmyal ba' ma'i phung brda skad cag yang pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal la zhes bya ba nas
283b2: brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag
283b3: nas rnam par ldang ngo / / de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dang de dag tu
283b4: sde'o/ / des shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin
283b5: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyag/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos
283b6: nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
283b7: dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho sbyor ba de dang de dag du skye'o// des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
283b8: can dmyal ba'ama'i phung po ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sku brjod //

284a1: dbyangs klog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang / bde ba 'thob ste// de dag dga' ba dang bde bdes sems can dmya
284a2: bde dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / / de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de
284a3: ngag tu skye'o/ / des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas de/
284a4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs
284a5: rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs
284a6: rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
284a7: can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ dbyangs
284a8: mog go/ / de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo//

284b1: de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho thong ba de dang de dag tu skye gongs
284b2: stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig tan gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal po'i mo'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas tenade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
284b3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang
284b4: pa'athob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang ro// sangs rgyas
284b5: bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ / des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
284b6: byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi grol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
284b7: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs/
284b8: rgyas kyi zla re thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi phye gnas

285a1: dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des
285a2: lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
285a3: gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do// dbyangs sgrog go//
285a4: de'i tshe byol song gis gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang /
285a5: gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
285a6: gzugs shing 'tsha stong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ / des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtsol
285a7: song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
285a8: bya ba'i sgra brjed do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde

285b1: ba des byol sa ga ste gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang
285b2: gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ / des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin
285b3: rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
285b4: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang
285b5: sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang /
285b6: gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang ga na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang shar gyi phyogs
285b7: mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
285b8: tan gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sra brjod do// bya

286a1: zlog go/ / de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thob nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba
286a2: des byol song gis gnas dang / gshan rje 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rdo'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'ang gang dang
286a3: gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o// des shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig zin gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi sku
286a4: gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gsheg
286a5: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe bo la song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de
286a6: dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye
286a7: gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho myong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des ljon pa
286a8: phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin

286b1: rje'i 'jig can pa sdug bsngal ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyaka 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra
286b2: brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nab dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde
286b3: ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi 'di gang
286b4: dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang dag tu skye'o// des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye
286b5: gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin
286b6: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ / dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes
286b7: pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde bathob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //
286b8: de dag byol seng gi rtse gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag

287a1: du ba'o/ / des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gI klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi sgra gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi rtse
287a2: gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/
287a3: zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag
287a4: dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi ske gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas// sangs
287a5: rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o// des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song
287a6: gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/
287a7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
287a8: skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol so gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //

287b1: snga gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang ga na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho song ba da
287b2: dag pas2/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ snga ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun de/ sems can dpal ba dang
287b3: song pa mi gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gcig mngon par sA la la de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi snga srog/ chos kyis klog/ dge 'dun
287b4: bar gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dganas rnam par
287b5: langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / bol song gi gnas dang /
287b6: gshin rje'i 'jig rten de nas rnam par bslad pa yod dam/ gsol ga bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
287b7: sems dpa' chen pos/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa
287b8: do/ / nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor smra ba'i chos nyid nye bar bzang na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po

288a1: 'gos shes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi sgo chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
288a2: khams pa da bya'i rgyu las blang ba mngon par skal pa byed do/ / de ltar bai dUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgrub pa'i srid pa mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor los snar pa'i srid pa mngon
288a3: par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// so ma 'dod pa rnams la som gyi sbyin pa byed do// bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do// gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byeng
288a4: ngo la tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do/ / phreng ba 'dod pa rnabs la phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do// spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do// zug pa 'dod pa rnams la zug pa'i phyin pa byed do// ra
288a5: 'dod pa rnams la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do/ / khyil 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do// 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do// yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nad kyi
288a6: rgyan rtsi dang ye byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dud dang mun shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
288a7: bai dUr+ya dang / dud dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de des de ltar zas 'dod pa la zas byin/ so ma 'dod pa la sem byed// zhen pa
288a8: 'dod pa la zhen pa ba na/ gos 'dod pa la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa le me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ thug pa 'dod pa la drug pa ban/ ma la ma 'dad

288b1: sa na/ kyis 'dod pa la sa byad/ 'dod pa la 'byar/ yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ rad kyi rgyan rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa la dad kyi byen rtse dang yo bya phyir/ de bu dang / pu tig dang /
288b2: dang / dud dang / man shes dang / bai ru dang / kaser dngul 'dod pa la/ dor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dAdUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa das/ me'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar
288b3: byer nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa zag dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos stor to// sems can de dag gis kyang / chos bstan pa de thos nas bra na med pa yang dag par
288b4: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol du phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ snga ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis
288b5: papo che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod
288b6: bzhon pa byer/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni ma tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams ni slob byin/ zag pa 'dod pa rnams
288b7: lan pa byan/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni bal ra byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams lani 'arab byid/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rgyan rtsi dang yo byad
288b8: 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin// nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dud dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang

289a1: ma dashel dang / byi ru dang / gsar dngul byin pa nas mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sams/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ lha ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan du
289a2: des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289a3: pos 'khor los kar ba'i srid pa mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ kau ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sgo ma byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin
289a4: ka 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni grang ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnam la ni mal cha byin/ khyim
289a5: 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tshe ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu
289a6: ta ka dang / bai dA rA dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang
289a7: yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir to// rab
289a8: 'byor de lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gan

289b1: gted du bsams te/ skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los skur ba'i rigs su skye zhing de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams 'ge ba dra'i las kyi las la rab du 'god
289b2: de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ba'i
289b3: dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par
289b4: thar pa bzad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bangan pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs bcwa
289b5: dag sa 'jigs pa ba'i dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag
289b6: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang / nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bla ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan/
289b7: mkhas pa gagagis/ lus pa ma'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam
289b8: ngan ba'i dang / da med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /

290a1: dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam
290a2: par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
290a3: ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab du bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu mo'i
290a4: mkhan po 'am/ bla ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
